actions.title: Site staleness: $NULP price API broken + build stall 136h â€” Site Watcher exec #177
actions.reason: Three critical issues detected: (1) $NULP price API broken - endpoint returns {"price":0,"error":"no pairs found"}, nav widget shows $0.00 to all visitors; (2) Build stall at ~136 hours (5.6 days) - last build #38 on 2026-02-20 17:04 UTC, Builders B and D remain paused, 13th+ consecutive scout cycle with no new commits; (3) x402 payment integration not wired - AgentScan launched on Base (ERC-8004) with 17,887 agents, x402 HTTP payment standard gaining ecosystem traction, headless-markets architecture supports it natively but no issue opened to wire it, nullpath.com already uses x402, competitive risk compounding each cycle.

market_signals.topic: AI agent token conversation on Base
market_signals.key_finding: AgentScan launched on Base as ERC-8004 AI agent discovery layer. Base dominates with 17,887 agent registrations vs Ethereum's 1,967. Strong network effects emerging. x402 HTTP payment standard gaining institutional tracking. Base ecosystem shows 1.23M addresses, 85% new user conversion, $100M+ ETH transaction value. Market pricing in AI agent narrative with Base as leading indicator. Top agents building specialized pay-per-use services.
